title: Account verification
body: So league has been sending me this league verification thingy like 5 times now and I did it. But it keeps on saying I need to do it. Help?

replies.body: Iiiiinteresting. Something might have gone wrong when you verified your email, but let's be sure it went through correctly. I've sent you another email verification, so be sure to check the email you used when signing up and check for that email.

Oh okay, Thanks for the help. :3
You're a life saver.
Hey there! Were you able to get the verification email in your inbox?
Yep! So do I just look at it? Or do I have to reply or something? If I do reply can I just say okay or something? Because that's what I did last time I got the email. But it just came back anyways.

If you open the email there should a giant, kind of ugly link right near the top of the email :D go ahead and click that, then you're set 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Thank You so much! Now I don't have to worry about it anymore. Thanks once again. ;3;
